constantValues: Container for feedback and ratings for knowledge articles.

members.name: rating

constantValues: Specifies how helpful the related record was.

members.description: Specifies how helpful the related record was.

members.name: normalizedRating

constantValues: Shows the rating scaled to a value between 0 and 1 based on minimum and maximum ratings.

members.description: Shows the rating scaled to a value between 0 and 1 based on minimum and maximum ratings.

members.name: source

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows where the feedback was submitted from.

members.description: Shows where the feedback was submitted from.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the record that the feedback is associated with.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the record that the feedback is associated with.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who last updated the record.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was closed. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: title

constantValues: Type a title for the feedback.

members.description: Type a title for the feedback.
